explanation: [0-0] A metal skeleton stands in front of a dark blue grid background, its entire frame composed of exposed wires and metal plates. It has two long ears, its body slightly leaning to the left, its legs slightly bent, its arms hanging in front of it, with two sharp claws.
[0-5] Then, it slightly shakes its ears, raises its head, and straightens up, facing forward. A red electric current is transported from its chest upwards to its brain.

[5-9] Subsequently, it raises its head and opens its mouth, then raises its left hand, tilts its head to the right, shakes its chin, and then stands straight, looking at its left hand. The fingers of its left hand bend, turning the palm upwards, and then the fingers open.

[5-9] Subsequently, it raises its head and opens its mouth, then raises its left hand, tilts its head to the right, shakes its chin, and then stands straight, looking at its left hand. The fingers of its left hand bend, turning the palm upwards, and then the fingers open.

[5-9] Subsequently, it raises its head and opens its mouth, then raises its left hand, tilts its head to the right, shakes its chin, and then stands straight, looking at its left hand. The fingers of its left hand bend, turning the palm upwards, and then the fingers open.

[9-14] Then it shakes violently, the metal skeleton disappears, replaced by a huge, muscular bear with a black hat on its head, glowing red. It continues to look at its left hand with its mouth open, revealing glowing teeth. The red halo disappears, its whole body turns purple, its teeth become brighter, it shakes its teeth and makes a fist with its left hand, and then shakes violently again. It raises both hands, the hat on its head moves out of the picture from the right, and it transforms into a metal skull with round, bulging eyes, with red light flashing rapidly on its body.

[14-22] Then the light around it disappears briefly, its round bulging eyes glowing as it looks at its raised right hand. It spreads the fingers of its right hand and looks down. Then the body shakes violently, the previous monster disappears, replaced by a rotting, terrible monster. It has a brownish-green appearance with reddish-brown corrosion marks, two horns on its head, sharp teeth exposed, and its hands raised and spread on both sides of its body. It leans forward and turns right, opens its mouth, raises its left claw and scratches forward, its left horn moves slightly.
